page.title: 13KINGMOOR RECREATION
page.content:
{KINGMOOR RECREATION St Peter's Hall is where a lot of activites are held, Guides on Monday and Wednesday and Sunday School on Sunday. At Kingmoor Junior School Hall, judo is held on Thursday and Brownies on Wednesdays and Mondays. Keep fit is held in the Sands Sports Centre on Tuesday and Kingmoor Infant School on Wednesday. There is a Squash Club at Cargo which is used by residents from throughout the Kingmoor area. Other indoor sports and activities can be pursued in various places within the city.
{ { }
